mapper.select: select t.id, t.dept_id, t.nickname, t.sex, t.age, t.pwd, t.account, t.phone, t.email, t.idnumber, t.address, t.money, t.integral, t.head, t.flag, t.create_time, t.remark, tm.name deptName from tb_sys_user t left join tb_sys_dept tm on t.dept_id = tm.id where account = #{account}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sys_user(dept_id, nickname, sex, age, pwd, account, phone, email, idnumber, address, money, integral, head, flag, create_time, remark) values (#{deptId}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{pwd}, #{account}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idnumber}, #{address}, 0, 0, #{head}, '0', now(), #{remark} )
mapper.update: update tb_sys_user set nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, idnumber = #{idnumber}, address = #{address}, head = #{head}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
